Title: Object: The flight into Egypt
Series: Houghton Gallery
Description: Mary sits on an ass, holding the Christ child in her arms; Joseph walks beside her, above them fly three putti; published state. Plate 45 of Vol.1 of the 'Houghton Gallery'. 1778 Mezzotint
Curator's comments: For a comment on the 'Houghton Gallery', see Kk,4.1.
Bibliographic references: Rubinstein 1991 / Richard Earlom (1743-1822) and Boydell's Houghton Gallery (45)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Charles Long, Baron Farnborough
Acquisition notes: for comment on the acquisition history see Kk,4.1
